title: CSS Paged Media Module Level 3
body: Add support for the paged media module, which will allow web sites and applications to have full control over print headers and footers among other things.

comments.body: +1 for support of the @page { size: letter landscape } style. I don't care if the user can change the orientation of the page within the print dialog, I just want the specified orientation to be preselected when the print dialog pops up.

Especially page counters would be great. That would allow page numbers on the printed version of long HTML pages (specifically my use case would be collections of Wikipedia articles), and (together with https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/257854-microsoft-edge-developer/suggestions/6261314-generated-content-for-paged-media ) a table of contents that references those page numbers.
this includes support for @page { size: a4 landscape }
